subject: RE: [junit] Native Code and JUnit
msgSnippet: setup is run befor every test. You might add a static block that does this library loading. ... From: Markus Kohler [mailto:kohler@cms.tecmath.de] Sent:
messageBody:
setup is run befor every test. You might add a static block that does this
library loading.

-----Original Message-----
From: Markus Kohler [mailto:kohler@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2001 5:47 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Native Code and JUnit


Hi,
I'm trying to test some Java code that uses JNI to access some native
Windows NT functions.
I'm running into trouble when loading the library.
When running the test using the swing GUI it works only every second time.
The problem is that it claims that the library (dll) is already loaded.

For loading the dll I added the line
System.loadLibrary("myLib");

to setup()

Does anybody know how to detect that the library is loaded ?

Regards,
Markus
